name: Island Keeper - Puzzle
description:
Island Keeper is a top-down puzzle game where you will build bridges in order to restore connection between islands.

Solve puzzles and collect wood to build a bridge.
Explode obstacles using special items which you will find during your adventure.

___________________________________________________________________________________

Instructions:

Move using W, A, S, D.

Select collected item by clicking on it and then click on the obstacle to destroy it.

Use replay button if you get stuck.

___________________________________________________________________________________
